pages.text: $(li)Those hard mandibles once belonged to a mighty creature known as the $(l:patchouli:bosses/void_worm)Void Worm$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:redstone/alexsmobs/void_worm_beak)Void Worm Beak$(/l) or the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/dimensional_carver)Dimensional Carver$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
